update tb_member set no = #{no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user = #{user,jdbcType=BIGINT}, duty = #{duty,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, affiliation = #{affiliation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, company_type = #{companyType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, business = #{business,jdbcType=INTEGER}, type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, audit = #{audit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, apply_date = #{applyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} valid = #{valid,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select u.name, u.gender, u.id_card_num, u.mobilephone, u.email, u.image, SUBSTRING_INDEX(u.concord,'/',1) as province, SUBSTRING_INDEX(u.concord,'/',-1) as city, m.duty, m.affiliation, pc.name as company_type, m.company_type as company_type_id, pb.name as business, m.business as business_id, mp.type_name as type, mp.type as type_id, mp.price from tb_user u LEFT JOIN tb_member m ON u.id = m.user and m.valid = #{valid} LEFT JOIN tb_member_price mp ON m.type = mp.id LEFT JOIN tb_parameter pc ON pc.id = m.company_type LEFT JOIN tb_parameter pb ON pb.id = m.business where u.id = #{userId}
select m.id as memberId, mp.type_name, mp.price from tb_user u LEFT JOIN tb_member m ON u.id = m.user INNER JOIN tb_member_price mp ON m.type = mp.id where u.id = #{userId}

select u.name, u.image, m.duty, m.no, mp.type_name, DATE_ADD(m.apply_date,INTERVAL 1 YEAR) as valid_period from tb_user u LEFT JOIN tb_member m ON u.id = m.user and m.valid = #{valid} LEFT JOIN tb_member_price mp ON m.type = mp.id where u.id = #{userId}

SELECT m.id, u.name, u.id_card_num, u.concord, u.mobilephone, u.email, m.duty, m.affiliation, pc.name as company_name, pb.name as business_name, mp.type_name, mp.price, ADDDATE(m.apply_date,INTERVAL 1 YEAR) as valid_period FROM tb_user u INNER JOIN tb_member m ON u.id = m.user LEFT JOIN tb_parameter pc ON m.company_type = pc.id LEFT JOIN tb_parameter pb ON m.business = pb.id LEFT JOIN tb_member_price mp ON m.type = mp.id WHERE m.audit = #{audit} AND m.valid = #{valid} LIMIT #{start},#{pageSize}

SELECT count(m.id) as count FROM tb_user u INNER JOIN tb_member m ON u.id = m.user
WHERE m.audit = #{audit} AND m.valid = #{valid}
